item.title: Amber add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Truly, life is wasted on the living, Nobody Owens. For one of us is too foolish to live, and it is not I." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Amber add a quote by Andrew Davidson
item.description: "My first, and most lasting, addiction has always been to the obsessive study of any matter that took hold of my curiosity." -- Andrew Davidson

item.title: Amber add a quote by Mary Roach
item.description: "Footnote: In 1998, a woman in Saline, Michigan received a patent for a Decorative Penile Wrap...The patent included three pages of drawings, including a penis wearing a ghost outfit, another in the robes of the Grim Reaper, and one dressed up to look like a snowman. " -- Mary Roach

item.title: Amber add a quote by Mary Roach
item.description: "The paper does not provide the exact number of penises eaten by ducks, but the author says there have been enough over the years to prompt the coining of a popular saying: 'I better get home or the ducks will have something to eat." -- Mary Roach

item.title: Amber add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Amber add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "If you want to call it that. But it is a very specific sort of magic. There's a magic you take from death. Something leaves the world, something else comes into it." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Amber add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Because there are mysteries. Because there are things that people are forbidden to speak about. Because there are things they do not remember." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Amber add a quote by Andrew Davidson
item.description: "The best a man can do is to remain silent, because any time he prates on about God, he is committing the sin of lying. The true master knows that if he had a God he could understand, he would never hold Him to be God." -- Andrew Davidson

item.title: Amber add a quote by Andrew Davidson
item.description: "While I'm not claiming that I now feel great love for all people, I can state with some confidence that I hate fewer people than I used to. This may seem like a weak claim to personal growth, but sometimes these things should be judged by distance traveled rather than by current position." -- Andrew Davidson

item.title: Amber add a quote by Andrew Davidson
item.description: "What do I do next?' 'Maybe it's your time to wait too.' She dug the heels of her boots firmly into the ground and set her shoulders more stiffly against the sea breeze. 'Love is an action you must repeat ceaselessly." -- Andrew Davidson
